author: adoyle235
title: Location
text: We were very pleased with our stay at this hotel. The staff were happy to help with our requests for written instructions for taxi drivers or with locating places to visit. The breakfast and dinner buffets were excellent. The mushroom soup couldn't have been better. The only downside was the smell from the lobby toilets. Beijing is a very big city and maybe struggles with sanitation. Choose a room on a higher floor.
